sentences.cn: 我在最初两次讲演时感到非常紧张。

sentences.cn: 这是肉眼胜过雷达的又一事例。

sentences.en: It's not a case of whether anyone would notice or not.
sentences.cn: 这不是会不会有人注意到的问题。

sentences.en: Police officers on the case are reckoning to charge someone very shortly.
sentences.cn: 调查这个案子的警官正在考虑尽快起诉嫌疑人。

sentences.en: This is a straightforward case, as these things go.
